instructions: From any home screen, tap Gmail . Tap the pencil icon to compose an email. Enter email recipient in the To field. Once you start typing, your contacts will display. Enter email subject and message text. Tap the paperclip at the top. Tap desired file location: Attach file Insert from Drive Tap desired file. File is attached the email. Tap the Send message icon at the top
From any home screen, tap Gmail . Touch and hold desired email. Tap the trash can at the top.

Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 1 1 Make sure your iPhone Touch is running iOS 9.1 or later. To find out what version your iPod is running on, do the following: [3] Press the Menu button (the large button at the bottom of the screen) to get to your main screen. Click on Settings . Select About . The version of iOS will appear here. If your version is 9.0 or earlier, see this method . Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 2 2 Connect your iPod Touch to the internet. If you re not already connected to Wi-Fi, you ll need to connect now. See How to Get Internet on the iPod Touch if you need help getting online. Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 3 3 Open the App Store Image titled Iphoneappstoreicon.png . You ll usually find this app on the home screen. Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 4 4 Tap . It s the magnifying glass at the bottom-right corner of the screen. Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 5 5 Type youtube into the search bar and tap the key. The Search key is at the bottom-right corner of the keyboard. A list of matching results will appear. Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 6 6 Tap the YouTube app. It s the white icon containing a red rectangle with a white sideways triangle inside. This opens the app s download page. Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 7 7 Tap . It s near the top-right corner of the page. The app will begin downloading. When the download is complete, GET will change to OPEN, and the YouTube icon will be added to one of your home screens. You may be prompted to sign in with your Apple ID or use another verification method before the app will download. Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 8 8 Open YouTube. You can tap OPEN if you re still in the App Store, or return to the home screen and tap the YouTube icon (the white square with a red rectangle and white triangle inside). Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 9 9 Browse or search for a video. To browse, swipe down and check out recommended videos, or tap Trending at the bottom of the screen (the flame icon) to see what s popular. To search, tap the magnifying glass icon near the top-right corner of the screen, type what you re looking for, and then tap the Search key. Image titled Watch YouTube Videos on Your iPod Step 10 10 Tap the video you want to watch. The video will start to play. The free version of YouTube is ad-supported, which means you may have to watch an ad before the video will play. Sometimes you ll have the option to skip the ad by tapping a Skip Ad button at the bottom of the video. Advertisement
